author: Renato Fabbri

resources.name: RDF/XML file of data from the federal social participation portal (participa.br)
RDF/Turle file of data from the federal social participation portal (participa.br)

name: participabr
notes:
Participa.br is the Brazilian federal portal of social participation.
This dataset is a RDF representation of the Noosfero Postgresql dump from
~July/2014. This dataset presents users, articles, commentaries, friendships, votes, tags and tagging.

==
Link to portal: http://www.participa.br/

==
This dataset is part of other brazilian social participation linked data:
http://datahub.io/dataset/aa
http://datahub.io/dataset/cidadedemocratica

==
These are IPython Notebooks with online scripts to analyse this dataset:
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/1.%20Classificacao%20via%20Texto.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/2.%20Sele%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20por%20rankeamento%20e%20limiar.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/3.%20Redes%20de%20amizade%20e%20de%20intera%C3%A7%C3%A3o.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/4.%20Classifica%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20de%20conte%C3%BAdo%20via%20conectividade%20dos%20participantes.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/5.%20Acesso%20local%20e%20remoto%20ao%20endpoint%20SparQL.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/Exemplos%20de%20classifica%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20pelo%20texto.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/OscilacaoNaDistribuicaoDeTamanhoDaSentenca.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/aa%20reasoning%20e%20participa.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/cidade%20democr%C3%A1tica%2C%20aa%20e%20participa.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/consultas%20SparQL%20ao%20Participa.br%2C%20estat%C3%ADsticas%20e%20visualiza%C3%A7%C3%B5es.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/pnud4%20-%20aux.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/pnud4%20-%20rotinas%20de%20recomendacao.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/pnud4-ap.ipynb

==
Related OWL ontologies are:

Participa.br Ontology (OPa):
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2014/12/OPaDados.owl
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2014/12/OPaDados.ttl
(alternate:
https://github.com/ttm/opa/raw/master/OPaDados.ttl
https://github.com/ttm/opa/raw/master/OPaDados.owl
)

Deprecated for Participa.br data, but useful for conceptual matters:
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2014/01/opa.owl
(alternate:
http://sourceforge.net/p/labmacambira/fimDoMundo/ci/master/tree/textos/ontologia/OWL/opa.owl?format=raw
)

Ontology of Social Participation (OPS):
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2015/01/ops.owl
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2015/01/ops.ttl

Social Library Ontology and Vocabulary (OBS and VBS):
(all here: https://github.com/ttm/vocabulario-participacao)

==
This script uses the PostgreSQL dump from Participa.br and
delivers a RDF version of data:
https://github.com/ttm/opa/blob/master/triplificaParticipa3.py

==
Related documents:

(UNDP product) https://github.com/ttm/pnud5/raw/master/latex/produto.pdf

(UNDP product) https://github.com/ttm/pnud4/raw/master/latex/produto.pdf

(UNDP product) https://github.com/ttm/pnud3/raw/master/latex/produto.pdf

(academic article) http://arxiv.org/abs/1501.02662

==
RDF/XML and RDF/Turtle are in this datahub.io page.

==
Authors are grateful to CNPq (process: 140860/2013-4, project 870336/1997-5), United Nations Development Program (PNUD/ONU, contract: 2013/000566; 
project BRA/12/018), SNAS/SGPR from the Brazilian Presidency, and the Postgraduate Committee of the São Carlos Physics Institute (IFSC/USP).
Authors thank Datahub.io team for hosting the present triplestore.
title: Participa.br RDF dataset
